mapper.insert: insert into insure_entry_log (id, hosp_code, visit_id, insure_org_code, medicine_org_code, patient_code, is_hospital, inpt_visit_no,outpt_visit_no, aac001, medical_reg_no, is_advice_entry,is_mris_entry, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id},#{hospCode},#{visitId},#{insureOrgCode},#{medicineOrgCode},#{patientCode}, #{isHospital},#{inptVisitNo},#{outptVisitNo},#{aac001},#{medicalRegNo},#{isAdviceEntry},#{isMrisEntry},#{crteId},#{crteName},#{crteTime})
mapper.delete: delete from insure_entry_log where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and visit_id = #{visitId}
mapper.select:
select iiv.visit_no,iiv.medicine_org_code,iiv.aka130 ,iiv.visit_id,iiv.hosp_code,iiv.medical_reg_no,iiv.insure_reg_code,iiv.insure_org_code, iib.aaz500,iib.aac003,iib.aac002,iib.aac001,iib.aaa027,iiv.is_hospital,iib.aka130, (select patient_code from inpt_visit iv where iiv.visit_id = iv.id and iiv.hosp_code = iv.hosp_code) as patientCode from insure_individual_visit iiv left join insure_individual_basic iib on iiv.mib_id = iib.id and iiv.hosp_code =iib.hosp_code where iiv.hosp_code=#{hospCode}
and iiv.visit_id = #{visitId}

select a.id, a.hosp_code hospCode, a.visit_id visitId, a.diagnose_ids diagnoseIds, a.order_no orderNo, a.doctor_id doctorId, a.doctor_name doctorName, a.dept_id deptId, a.dept_name deptName, a.type_code typeCode, a.prescribe_type_code prescribeTypeCode, a.settle_id settleId, a.remark , a.is_settle isSettle, a.is_cancel isCancel, a.is_print isPrint, a.is_herb_hospital isHerbHospital, a.herb_num herbNum, a.herb_use_code herbUseCode, a.weight, a.agent_name agentName, a.agent_cert_no agentCertNo, a.crte_id crteId, a.crte_name crteName, a.crte_time crteTime, a.cancel_name cancelName, a.cancel_date cancelDate from outpt_prescribe a where a.visit_id = #{visitId} and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select ia.id, ia.hosp_code, ia.visit_id, ia.baby_id, ia.order_no, ia.iat_id, ia.iatd_group_no, ia.iatd_group_seq_no, ia.iatd_id, ia.in_dept_id, ia.exec_dept_id, ia.dept_id, ia.group_no,ia.group_seq_no, ia.type_code,ia.sign_code, ia.start_exec_num, ia.end_exec_num, ia.bfc_id, ia.item_code, ia.item_id, ia.item_name, ia.content, ia.spec, ia.prep_code,ia.dosage, ia.dosage_unit_code, ia.usage_code, ia.rate_id, ia.speed_code, ia.num, ia.unit_code, ia.price, ia. total_price, ia.total_num, ia.total_num_unit_code, ia.herb_num, ia.use_days, ia.use_code, is_skin, ia.is_positive, ia.herb_note_code, ia.phar_id, ia.remark, ia.plan_stop_time, ia.technology_no, ia.herb_use_code, ia.is_give, ia.exec_id, ia.exec_name, ia.second_exec_id, ia.second_exec_name, ia.long_start_time, ia.last_exec_time, ia.teach_doctor_id, ia.teach_doctor_name, ia.is_check, ia.check_id, ia.check_name, ia.check_time,ia.is_stop_check,ia.stop_doctor_id, ia.stop_doctor_name, ia.stop_time, ia.stop_check_id, ia.stop_check_name, ia.stop_check_time, ia.is_long, ia.is_stop, ia.is_reject, ia.reject_remark, ia.crte_id, ia.crte_name, ia.crte_time, /*iv.in_no as inNo,*/ (select name from base_dept bd where bd.id = ia.dept_id and bd.hosp_code = ia.hosp_code ) as deptName, (select name from base_dept bd where bd.id = ia.exec_dept_id and bd.hosp_code = ia.hosp_code ) as adviceExecDeptName, (select name from sys_code_detail where value = ia.prep_code and c_code='JXFL') as prepCode, (select name from sys_code_detail where value = ia.usage_code and c_code='YF') as usageCode, (select name from sys_code_detail where value = ia.unit_code and c_code='DW') as unitCode, (select name from base_rate ba where ba.id = ia.rate_id and ba.hosp_code = ia.hosp_code) as rateName, (case ia.item_code when ia.item_code = '1' then (select bd.code from base_drug bd where ia.item_id = bd.id and bd.hosp_code =ia.hosp_code ) when ia.item_code= '2' then (select bm.code from base_material bm where ia.item_id = bm.id and bm.hosp_code = ia.hosp_code ) when ia.item_code = '3' then (select ba.code from base_advice ba where ia.item_id = ba.id and ba.hosp_code = ia.hosp_code) when ia.item_code ='4' then (select bi.code from base_item bi where ia.item_id = bi.id and bi.hosp_code = ia.hosp_code) end ) as hospDrugOrMaterialItemCode, (case when ia.is_insure_upload is null or ia.is_insure_upload = '' then '未上传' when ia.is_insure_upload ='1' then '已上传' end) isAdviceEntry from inpt_advice ia where ia.hosp_code=#{map.hospCode} and ia.visit_id=#{map.visitId} and ia.is_reject != '1' and ia.is_submit = '1'
and (ia.is_insure_upload is null or ia.is_insure_upload = '' or ia.is_insure_upload = '0')
mapper.update:
update inpt_advice set is_insure_upload = '1' where id in
#{dto.id}
mapper.select: select iv.id, iv.hosp_code, iv.profile_id, iv.in_profile, iv.in_no, iv.name, iv.gender_code, iv.age, iv.age_unit_code, iv.birthday, iv.nation_code, iv.cert_code, iv.cert_no, iv.marry_code, iv.phone, iv.address, iv.preferential_type_id,iv. patient_code, iv.receive_hosp_name, iv.bed_id, bed_name, iv.nursing_code, diet_type, iv.Illness_code, iv.status_code, iv.in_ward_id, iv.in_dept_id, iv.in_dept_name, in_time, iv.zz_doctor_id, iv.zz_doctor_name, iv.jz_doctor_id, iv.jz_doctor_name, iv.zg_doctor_id, iv.zg_doctor_name, in_remark, iv.in_mode_code, iv.in_disease_id, iv.in_disease_name, iv.in_disease_icd10,iv. in_situation_code, iv.outpt_visit_no, iv.outpt_doctor_id, iv.outpt_doctor_name, iv.outpt_disease_id, iv.outpt_disease_name, iv.outpt_disease_icd10, iv.out_ward_id, iv.out_dept_id, out_dept_name, out_time, iv.out_disease_id, iv.out_disease_name, iv.out_disease_icd10, iv.out_oper_id, iv.out_oper_name, out_oper_time, iv.out_situation_code, iv.out_remark, iv.out_mode_code, iv.is_archive, iv.archive_time, iv.archive_id, iv.archive_name, iv.insure_code, iv.insure_remark, iv.total_advance, iv.total_cost, iv.total_balance, iv.crte_id, iv.crte_name, iv.crte_time, (select medicine_org_code from insure_individual_visit iiv where iiv.visit_id = iv.id and iiv.hosp_code = iv.hosp_code) as medicinOrgCode, bd.name as diseaseName, bd.code as diseaseCode, (select bd.type_code from base_disease bd where ii.disease_id = bd.id and ii.hosp_code = bd.hosp_code) as typeCode from inpt_visit iv left join inpt_diagnose ii on iv.id = ii.visit_id and iv.hosp_code = ii.hosp_code left join base_disease bd on bd.id = ii.disease_id where iv.hosp_code=#{hospCode} and iv.id=#{visitId}
select visit_id as visitId,cost_id as costId,hosp_code as hospCode from insure_individual_cost where hosp_code=#{hospCode} and visit_id=#{visitId}

select iat_id as iatId from inpt_cost where (id,hosp_code) in
(#{costListMap.costId},#{costListMap.hospCode})

select * from insure_entry_log where hosp_code=#{hospCode} and visit_id=#{visitId}
and is_advice_entry = #{isAdviceEntry}
